Funnel

Function Keywords

names::AbstractVector
values::AbstractVector
legend::Bool = false
kwargs...(modifies top-level `EChart` fields)

Single Series

using ECharts
v = [100,60,80,70,50]
n = ["A", "B", "C", "D", "E"]
funnel(names, values)
